title: Willie Nelson isn’t sweating Donald Trump’s marijuana policy
text:
Willie Nelson isn’t sweating Donald Trump’s marijuana policy   16, 2017 at 1:08 PM 
As Donald Trump’s presidential inauguration lurks in a mere four days, many Americans have become growingly concerned about the future of their rights as a U.S. citizen. 
But not Willie Nelson when it comes to legal cannabis. 
While revealing his latest Trump-inspired song to Rolling Stone , the outlaw country legend also took the time to address the topic of marijuana law reform, as several cannabis advocates are worried that a Trump administration could do irreparable damage to laws in states that allow marijuana use for either medical or recreational use. 
“Who cares?” Nelson told Rolling Stone . “I didn’t have any problem finding [cannabis] when it was illegal, and now that it’s legal, it’s still no problem. Making it illegal again won’t stop people from smoking. They should have learned that back in prohibition days.” 
There you have it — Trump’s presidency isn’t going to stop Willie from smoking weed every day . Let’s hope it also doesn’t stop production of Willie Nelson’s Reserve -brand pot. Oscar Pascual
